title: Unsolved Mysteries: MAGA Edition - Do Any Republicans Know What Critical Race Theory Actually Is?
itunes:title: Unsolved Mysteries: MAGA Edition - Do Any Republicans Know What Critical Race Theory Actually Is?
description:
Roy Wood Jr. attempts to figure out why so many Republicans are adamantly against critical race theory, despite having no understanding of what it is.
